questions.text: What amusement park did Cliff want to build?
questions.explanation:
Postal World.

	Cliff believed that children needed real heroes to look up to. Of course, being Cliff, his idea of the perfect hero was the postman.

questions.text: What did the people in Indiana used to call Woody?
options: Woody the One Covered in Welts
questions.explanation:
Woody the Beekeeper.

	Woody had brought in a cage full of bees and put them in Rebecca's office. They got loose later in the show and Woody was seen carrying them out on his arms wearing a beekeeper's suit.

Mr. Stone

	Mr. Stone was the man who in a few episodes prior fired and then rehired Rebecca. It is not known why Mr. Stone was fired.

questions.text: How old did Carla say Cy Young was?
questions.explanation:
108.

	Carla: "Cy Young is 108 and dead and still doing better with Rebecca than you." She was referring to Sam's inability to get a date with Rebecca. Cy Young was a pitcher for the Boston Red Sox (and 4 other teams throughout his career). He died at the age of 88.

questions.text: How much was Norm being paid to help Sam get Rebecca?
questions.explanation:
$80.

	When Rebecca asked Norm how much Sam was paying him, Norm first said that Sam and him were good friends and that was why he was doing it. Then he quickly added $80.

"Ave Maria".

	The "Ave Maria" was originally recorded in 1853. Rebecca commented that she wasn't surprised Sam would do what he did but was surprised that Norm was a part of it. Norm said, "it was either this or listening to Cliff sing the 'Ave Maria'".

questions.text: Who was the new executive vice-president?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Teal

	Martin Teal was played by Alex Nevil. He was known for his role as a shuttle officer on "Star Trek" (2009).

Dennis.

	Dennis was played by Gerald Hiken. He was known for the 1981 movie "Reds" where he played Dr. Lorber.

questions.text: Why did Martin call Rebecca for a meeting?
questions.correct: to reinstate her as sole manager of Cheers
options: to tell her he was firing Sam
questions.explanation:
to reinstate her as sole manager of Cheers.

	Rebecca first met Martin Teal in the elevator. He hit on her and she made fun of him because he looked so young. She was scared because of this she would lose her job when she learned he was her new boss.

Frasier.

	He was afraid of all other insects as well. Carla told him one flew down his shirt and in a panicked state he ripped off his shirt. Then Carla said, "it was just a piece of fuzz."
